DOC.brief_summary: This study investigate persistence rabies Chinese manufacture antibody 1-5 year post-exposure prophylaxis vero cell antirabies vaccine antibody response single booster dose . A total 160 subject would enrol . These subject administer ChengDa antirabies vaccine 2005 2009 . After informed consent obtain , subject would test antirabies antibody titer give single booster dose . Seven 14 day later , investigator would re-evaluate antibody titer .
DOC.brief_title: Persistence Rabies Antibody 1-5 Years After Post-exposure Prophylaxis With Vero Cell Antirabies Vaccine Antibody Response Single Booster Dose
DOC.criteria: 20 60 year old Healthy Given ChengDa rabies vaccine Good compliance Obtained informed consent Other inclusion criterion
